actions.committee: Senate Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to transfer the title of the Robert F. Kennedy Stadium to the United States, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to operate and maintain such stadium, to increase certain District of Columbia taxes to pay for such stadium.

summary.text: Transfers the title of the Robert F. Kennedy Stadium to the United States. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to operate and maintain such stadium. Increases specified District of Columbia taxes to pay for such stadium. Provides for the repeal of the District of Columbia Stadium Act.

titles.title: A bill to transfer the title of the Robert F. Kennedy Stadium to the United States, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to operate and maintain such stadium, to increase certain District of Columbia taxes to pay for such stadium.
